nodes.text: Star Wars: The High Republic: The Edge of Balance

Star Wars: The High Republic: The Edge of Balance is a forthcoming canon manga series in the Star Wars: The High Republic multimedia project. The first volume of the series is scheduled for release by Viz Media on September 7, 2021 and will be written by Shima Shinya and Justina Ireland with illustrations by Mizuki Sakakibara.
